thread.title: Stormy Daniels sues Trump lawyer in interview fallout

title: Stormy Daniels sues Trump lawyer in interview fallout
text:
Stormy Daniels sues Trump lawyer in interview fallout 7:09am EDT - 02:12 
Adult film star Stormy Daniels sued Michael Cohen, President Donald Trump's personal lawyer, for defamation as fallout over her bombshell interview with CBS's ''60 Minutes'' continues. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
